subcommands.name: kick
subcommands.description: Kicks a user; they can rejoin using an invite link

options.name: target
options.description: The @ or 18-digit ID of a user

options.name: reason
options.description: Explanation for the kick

subcommands.name: ban
subcommands.description: Bans a user; they wont be able to rejoin

options.name: target
options.description: The @ or 18-digit ID of a user

options.name: reason
options.description: Explanation for the ban

options.name: delete
options.description: The number of days' worth of messages to delete

subcommands.name: unban
subcommands.description: Undoes a previous ban

options.name: target
options.description: The @ or 18-digit ID of a user

options.name: reason
options.description: Explanation for the unban

subcommands.name: editban
subcommands.description: Updates the reason a user was banned

options.name: target
options.description: The @ or 18-digit ID of a user

options.name: reason
options.description: Explanation for the edit

subcommands.name: tempban
subcommands.description: Sets a ban which expires automatically

options.name: target
options.description: The @ or 18-digit ID of a user

options.name: reason
options.description: Explanation for the temporary ban

options.name: length
options.description: How many days the user should remain banned

subcommands.name: softban
subcommands.description: Bans then unbans a user; purges their messages

options.name: target
options.description: The @ or 18-digit ID of a user

options.name: reason
options.description: Explanation for the soft ban

subcommands.name: masskick
subcommands.description: Kicks up to five users at once

options.name: targets
options.description: A list of users by @ or 18-digit IDs

options.name: reason
options.description: Explanation for the kick (applies to all users in the log)

name: emoji
description: Commands to update and track emojis

subcommands.name: display
subcommands.description: Displays an emoji in a larger size

options.name: emoji
options.description: The emoji to display

subcommands.name: add
subcommands.description: Adds an emoji to the server

options.name: attachment
options.description: An image file to turn into an emoji

options.name: url
options.description: The URL of the emoji

subcommands.name: delete
subcommands.description: Removes an emoji from the emoji list

options.name: emoji
options.description: The emoji to be deleted

subcommands.name: info
subcommands.description: Displays information about an emoji

options.name: emoji
options.description: The emoji to get information about

name: text
description: Commands which change the appearance or language of some text

subcommands.name: jarjar
subcommands.description: Meesa translate da message into Gungan, bombad

options.name: text
options.description: The text you want to do stuff with

subcommands.name: zoomer
subcommands.description: Makes ur msg bussin fr no cap

options.name: text
options.description: The text you want to do stuff with

subcommands.name: translate
subcommands.description: Tries to translate your message from one language to another

options.name: text
options.description: The text you want to do stuff with

options.name: language
options.description: What language to output

subcommands.name: emojify
subcommands.description: Decorates a message with some emojis

options.name: text
options.description: The text you want to do stuff with

subcommands.name: clap
subcommands.description: Adds some sassy claps to a message

options.name: text
options.description: The text you want to do stuff with

subcommands.name: aesthetic
subcommands.description: 𝓒𝓱𝓪𝓷𝓰𝓮𝓼 𝕥𝕙𝕖 卂卩卩乇卂尺卂几匚乇 Ø₣ ₳ ๓ēŞŞคງe

options.name: text
options.description: The text you want to do stuff with

options.name: style
options.description: Select an option from the list

name: clear
description: Commands to tidy up the server and users

subcommands.name: timeouts
subcommands.description: Cancels all of the active timeouts

subcommands.name: nicknames
subcommands.description: Clears all nicknames from server members

subcommands.name: bans
subcommands.description: Empties the ban list

subcommands.name: role
subcommands.description: Removes a specified role from any users who have it

options.name: role
options.description: The role to remove from all members

subcommands.name: reactions
subcommands.description: Removes reactions from recent posts

subcommands.name: bot
subcommands.description: Cleans up messages posted by the bot

subcommands.name: user
subcommands.description: Deletes recent messages from a specified user

options.name: target
options.description: The @mention or 18-digit ID of a user

subcommands.name: all
subcommands.description: Deletes a number of messages (default 5) from all users

options.name: amount
options.description: The number of messages to delete

name: info
description: Displays some information about something in the server

subcommands.name: postcount
subcommands.description: Gather message counts from specified channels and merge into messages_report.txt

options.name: channels
options.description: Optional comma-separated list of channel IDs to process (uses defaults if omitted)

options.name: cutoff
options.description: Optional cutoff date (ISO YYYY-MM-DD or relative like '2 months'); defaults to 2 months ago if omitted
